title: Neonatal withdrawal symptoms from maternal use of drugs of addiction
chapter: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
block: Other disorders originating in the perinatal period
category: Other conditions originating in the perinatal period
inclusion: conditions that have their origin in the perinatal period even though death or morbidity occurs later
Drug withdrawal syndrome in infant of dependent mother
exclusion: congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
reactions and intoxications from maternal opiates and tranquillizers administered during labour and delivery
